text: Anna Grodzka (born 16 March 1954) is a Polish politician. In 2011, she was elected to the National Assembly as a member of the Palikot's Movement party. She became Poland's first transsexual Member of Parliament. She is the only openly transgender MP in the world. She went to the University of Warsaw. She is bisexual. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1954 births Category:Bisexual people Category:LGBT politicians Category:Polish politicians Category:Transgender women
title: Anna Grodzka
